name: Albula
description:
Big canyon that has high walls and a strong waterflow, even with the water captures above.

Approach

Right after the village, two waterflows are comming together. Just about 200m after that, the canyon starts.

Descent

The canyon is made of 2 Sections, but both are very aquatic. First one (Cresta Gronda) only has waterfalls up to 5m. The second part (Igl Crap) is more impressive and also includes a rappel of 22m.

Exit

After the last abseils and downclimbs, follow the riverbed for half a kilometer until you get out on the right hand side.

Red tape

Background

Call the hydroelectric plant to know if they plan to release water !
